Detailed Description

Item model transform a tree Item model (QDirModel) on a Flat model. A flat model is a list. Node in the tree is show as title, and leaf is show as it.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

QModelIndex  root 
)

Create a flat model based on a QDirModel and a root index (if we don't want show all the model).
